keys: Colourful flags heavy cavalryman double cross

Betrug des bunten Markierungsfahnen schweren 
Cavalryman
Double croix de cavalryman lourd coloré d'indicateurs
Cruz dobro do cavalryman pesado colorido das bandeiras

Doppia traversa del cavalryman pesante colourful delle 
bandierine
Ζωηρόχρωμος βαρύς cavalryman διπλός σταυρός σημαιών

Cruz doble del cavalryman pesado colorido de los 
indicadores

          <title>
            <string language="hu">12. századi lovaszászlók</string>
            <string language="en">Cavalry standard from the 12th century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kavalleriestandard vom 12. Jahrhundert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Norme de cavalerie du 12ème siècle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Padrão da cavalaria do 1ò século</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Standard del cavalry dal dodicesimo secolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπα ιππικού από το 12$ο αιώνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estándar de la caballería a partir del 12mo 
siglo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Előreszegezett lándzsával vágtató magyar lovag és Árpád-kori zászlók (1-4. kép)</string>
            <string language="en">Galloping Hungarian knight holding forward a spear and standards from the Arpadian age (picture 1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Színes zászlók nehézlovas kettoskereszt,  </string>
            <string language="en">Colourful flags heavy cavalryman double cross</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galoppierender ungarischer Ritter, der vorwärts 
eine Stange und Standards vom Arpadian Alter (Abbildung 1-4) anhält</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chevalier hongrois galopant tenant en avant une 
lance et des normes de l'âge d'Arpadian (image 1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Knight hungarian galloping que prende para a 
frente uma lança e padrões da idade de Arpadian (retrato 1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La tenuta ungherese galloping del cavaliere 
in avanti un germoglio e standard dal Arpadian invecchia (immagine 
1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η καλπάζοντας ουγγρική εκμετάλλευση ιπποτών προς τα 
εμπρός μια λόγχη και πρότυπα από το Arpadian γερνά (εικόνα 
1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El caballero húngaro galloping que sostiene 
adelante una lanza y los estándares del Arpadian envejecen (cuadro 
1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrug des bunten Markierungsfahnen schweren 
Cavalryman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Double croix de cavalryman lourd coloré d'indicateurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cruz dobro do cavalryman pesado colorido das bandeiras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Doppia traversa del cavalryman pesante colourful delle 
bandierine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωηρόχρωμος βαρύς cavalryman διπλός σταυρός σημαιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
